CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: PCB Bancorp is a bank holding company, which engages in the provision of consumer and commercial banking services. The bank provides personal and business checking accounts and savings accounts services. It offers a broad range of loan, deposit, and other products and services. Also, it provides a broad range of loans along with deposit products focused on individuals, professionals, and small-to-medium sized businesses. The bank's E-banking services comprise online banking, mobile banking, and cash management.
